issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS, Base UI>Animation>transitions, it is possible get the UI layout be rendering for the wrong orientation. See screenshots attached.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on iPad 1
2) Navigate to Base UI>Animation>transitions in Landscape view
3) Click full window and rotate while the animation plays (timing is critical)
4) Tap close

Result:
Rendered window expects portrait

Expected Result:
UI matches orientation

Notes:
OCCURS on 1.6.2
OCCURS on iPad 2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink:  Rotating during animation causes window UI layout problems
fields.environment: iPad 1 (3.2.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
